name: Proots: Problem Roots
description:
Help your patients by finding the roots of their problems in this visual novel choose your own adventure style game!

.

Made for Global Game Jam 2023 in 48 with the theme: Roots

.

Controls:

Space: Continue Dialogue

Arrows - WASD - Mouse: Move between options & choices

.

Credits
